text: Yuri () is a genre about relationships between women in manga, anime, light novel, d≈çjinshi, webcomics, and other Japanese media. Yuri can be either about spirit, sex, friendship or emotions in such relationship. "Yuri" is a jargon word and it normally means "lily" in Japanese. The terms "S-class", "Girls Love" and "shoujo-ai" are also used to describe this genre. Category:Anime and manga terms Category:Anime and manga genres
title: Yuri (manga)
